[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@anglr/bootstrap-core](./bootstrap-core.md) &gt; [BootstrapTooltipDirective](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective.md)

## BootstrapTooltipDirective class

Directive applies (bootstrap) jQuery tooltip on all elements which have tooltip attribute specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BootstrapTooltipDirective implements AfterViewInit, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(element, platformId)](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BootstrapTooltipDirective</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [htmlTooltip](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective.htmltooltip.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether tooltip allows html content |
|  [text](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective.text.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Gets or sets tooltip text |
|  [trigger](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective.trigger.md) |  | <code>BootstrapTrigger</code> | Bootstrap tooltip trigger (click \| hover \| focus \| manual) How tooltip is triggered. You may pass multiple triggers; separate them with a space. Manual cannot be combined with any other trigger. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
